arts.sum: Roma will be hoping to continue their fine start to the season against a very poor Parma side who are yet to score on the road this season. Roma's 1-0 win over Sassuolo at the weekend was their secon...

arts.ttl: Can Parma End Terrible Away Record Against Roma? How Carlos Cuesta Can End 28-Year Wait For Win At Stadio Olimpico
arts.sum: Parma will search for their first away win over Roma in 28-years on October 29th, so we have looked into how Carlos Cuesta can end this nightmare streak. When Did Parma Last Beat Roma Away From Home?
